location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Diary of a journey across Arabia from El Khatif in the Persian Gulf, to Yambo in the Red Sea, during the year 1819. (With a map.) By Captain G. Forster Sadlier, of HM's 47th regiment; compiled from the records of the Bombay Government by P Ryan, Esq, Assistant Secretary to Government.'

physicalDescription.extent: There is a table of content at the beginning of the volume, detailing the arrangement of contents and page references. An introduction precedes the main body of the work.
Dimensions: 240 mm x 150 mm.Pagination: initial Roman numeral pagination (i-iii); Octavo.Condition: missing the folding map; mutilated: pp. 19-20 and pp. 71-72.

mods.abstract: Diary of a journey across Arabia from El Khatif in the Persian Gulf, to Yambo in the Red Sea, during the year 1819. (With a map.) By Captain G. Forster Sadlier [sic], of HM's 47th regiment; compiled from the records of the Bombay Government by P Ryan, Esq, Assistant Secretary to Government.Publication Details: Bombay: Printed at the Education Society's Press, Byculla, 1866.Ownership: With stamps of the India Office Library.
